actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of March 19, 1981 (H. Doc. 97-34), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, budget authority contained in the message of the President of March 19, 1981 (H. Doc. 97-34), for the Health Resources Administration of the Department of Health and Human Services.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of March 19, 1981 (H. Doc. 97-34), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
